fact: Did you know that the French Philosopher Voltaire amassed a fortune by exploiting a mathematical flaw in the French national lottery, enabling him to retire and dedicate himself to his writing?
didYouKnow: Did you also know that Voltaire is attributed with the quote: 'Every man is guilty of all the good he did not do'?
